titleStmt.title: A reply to Sr. Thomas Manwaring's answer to my two books. Written by Sr. Peter Leycester, Baronet, anno Domini, 1675. The second reply. Together with the case of Amicia truly stated
titleStmt.author: Leycester, Peter, Sir, 1614-1678.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Mainwaring, Sir Thomas. An answer to two books.
"The case of Amicia truly stated" has a separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
